text: $(br)$(#bd951a)Special: $()$(#ff0000)Wraps around a Plant, protecting it from most damage. Creates a Shadow Tile inside it.
$(br)$(#bd951a)"Gloom Vine's gloomy exterior shouldn't be seen as implying a gloomy interior. His interior is gloomy, but for complicated personal reasons that go way back."

pages.title: ‚òÅ Conceal Family
pages.text: $(#25228d)Gloom-vines power New Moon shadow plants and shoot gloom around it.
